title: People who make sure your team loses because they think you shouldent win
body:
So I just had a game where we where winning, jinx was fed and pushing, almost everyone worked together then suddenly about 25 minuets into the game yorick decides to try and ff we obviously said no, then he decides to afk farm and push while not helping out team at all as well as letting the enemy push  all our mid towers ensuring we lose the game.

his reason?  "my team is trash and shouldn't be allowed to win" 

Riot should be banning people like this this is on the same level of bad as a intentional feeder, and should be treated the same but no that would mean riot would have to actually work on their banning system and put effort into it. this needs to be punished harder it allows people who would have lost a game due to being outmatched to win free because someone decided they didn't like their team

P.S this was a ranked game and no I didn't do brilliantly this match. 

let me know below what you think.

replies.body:
If you reported him for it and he does it more he will be banned for it assuming that was his intent.

Like if he said the things you said he said then you could report for assisting the enemy team or whatever its called now. I think its grouped with griefing.

That's unsportsmanlike conduct.

It's a bannable offense. 

If that player continues being a stick in the mud, they will get banned for generally making League and its community look worse people already think it is.

I usually want to do this in games but care about my ELO too much.  If someone throws because you BMed him carelessly a lot of times the guy throwing is in the right morally regardless of what the Summoner's Code says.
The OP did not mention anything about the Yorick being BMed or flamed. Plus, punishing 3 people for the acts of one seems to reek of. . . poor morality.

If someone was willing to throw cause someone else didn't deserve it, the dude for sure BMed.

If that was your troll angle after about the 5th game you'd eat a 2 week ban.

Stop being surprised when people throw if you BM.  Before this stupid behavior system people would throw 100% of the time if someone BMed, it was understood that BM = no game.

no we pretty much focused on the game nobody BMed him not until the trolling started then the ADC got pissed (rightly so) but before his trolling we didn't flame anyone. 

his reason was our scores where bad which correct me if I'm wrong is not a valid reason or moral reason to troll.

Man the uptight guy on your team spammed 6 retreat pings on him at a crucial fight then.  You BMed this dude somehow I don't buy it.

One of you probably typed ...

If someone ellispises me in a norm I'm throwing straight up, I don't care lol.

Throwing a game entirely because someone types an ellipses directed to you seems to be the actions of someone who is selfish, childish, overly-sensitive, prone to tantrums, and ultimately, morally bankrupt. Might want to change your name if you're acting like a toddler on a regular basis.
Or you could just stop BMing and this wouldn't happen to you.

Okay let's get this shit straight: you honestly think a single, not even that offensive comment or an instance of pinging excessively makes it fair to ruin a game for your whole team? Are you even capable of taking any fucking criticism? The ellipses are usually for when someone does something incredibly stupid, such as going in 1v4 when none of the team is with them. How the actual fuck is ". . ." or "What are you doing?" serious BM?

To an extent, I can understand throwing if someone on your team is being incredibly toxic and telling you to commit suicide or claiming to support ISIS, but fucking ellipses? How childish are you?

... Is actually way worse BM than raging, because with raging at least you know the person is mad / tilted and really wants to win.

... just means he's being catty with you like a spoiled woman.  Way way worse.

You see?  I can tell what kind of BMs you did and why that guy threw.  You were boosted to gold and you didn't deserve to win that match cause you are straight BM.

Damn someone gets offended more easily than the stereotypical feminist. I am not the poster and have yet to see people throw for a reason so pathetic.

Boosted? Please. I don't play ranked games because in ranked I encounter people like you FAR too often. I really don't think one incident of BM makes someone "straight BM." I think the real BM is when people throw a game because of one person's actions that aren't that offensive.

You're the one on here getting mad cause someone threw a bot game.  I'm just trying to tell you what you have to do to not make it happen again.

If you can't hard carry a lane with any character, you don't have a right to BM in this game and the playerbase will punish you for it.  Learn to play before you BM.

I don't think I'm the person you're thinking of. The only way to lose a bot game if you've been playing more than a month is if you have 4 team mates that are deliberately feeding hard.

This has yet to happen to me. The only times I've ever seen someone on my team just throw have been a result of people refusing to ff or simply a great deal of tilt as a result of getting pubstomped.

Again, Jesus Christ. I don't talk much in game except for basic things like telling bot I'll gank after I get blue and the sort. When I ping, it's typically a MIA or if the enemy jungler is ganking. Not excessive stuff.
Perhaps your bad at reading but I stated it was a ranked game not a norm.

There's this thing. . . it's called "trolling." Maybe the guy had a bad day or whatever and he wasn't having a good game so when someone just made one small mistake like not healing or helping him in a situation he freaked out? That happens.

And aren't you the one who was supporting a dude's ban because he got BMed and flipped out when that happened? Seems pretty hypocritical to support bad behavior when someone BMs you in one situation but not in this one. . .

No, I've been playing a long time, I know which division I belong in, so I don't care about the games as much as you.

If you care if you win or not, stop BMing with your strat calls, ping spams and ... spam.

The old culture of the game is to throw when people like you BM and it's still around.

Well, that first sentence is totally irrelevant. And, why should we all be subjected to a stupid troll simply because you know that you belong in Cardboard VII and don't care about winning at all to the point that you'll troll if someone merely pings you like twice in a row?

Here's the thing: communication with your team is actually a good idea so that way the team is coordinated. It isn't fucking BM to try and coordinate or remind people they're going into a shitty situation. Spamming someone is incredibly rude, but you shouldn't fucking ruin a game for the rest of your team because one person is an asshole.

I honestly can't tell if you're a troll or actually cognitively disabled at this point. I mean, how in the hell can you justify trolling simply because someone is trying to coordinate?

Clearly the old culture was full of the handicapped if they consider pinging excessively one time or making a strategy good reason to throw. I mean, good Lord are you damn insane?

I solo climbed to gold with peel support and I'm in g3, lol.  Think about that, my peels carried in Silver where peels don't matter.

You can't carry lanes and your BMs make it worse.  Shouldn't have boosted to g5, this is your fault.

I'm a lot better at the game than you, know my position and I know how much the type of BMs you do effect climbs.

You can't BM in this game past Silver 2 unless you are a mechanical god.  Since G5 is ELO hell to you, you're actually bad, and need to be nicer.

I _highly_ doubt you're in G3 with an attitude as awful as yours, not to mention you've no proof you're in it considering you make your troll posts on the boards using a smurf.

I wasn't boosted and don't play ranked games because people in ranked are generally whiney assholes like you.

I'd sooner think communism would work out than believe you're better than I. And, once more, I'm not the one who made this post. I'm simply commenting on how stupid you're making yourself sound.

The game gets more and more toxic the higher you climb actually.

You don't play ranked because you aren't man enough to shoulder the Bronze label and do something about it.

My attitude is fine in ranked cause I don't talk to anyone in ranked.  If someone BMs I mute them.

In norms though when I run into someone like you boy, lol.  You're getting mad and I'm laughing guaranteed.

Can't believe you made a post on the boards about a bot game you BMed in, I thought at least this was about ranked.

No, it's more of I don't have the damn time to invest into the game because high school. No time to do anything about it so I only play casually.

Here's the thing: I didn't make this post and I haven't made any boards posts about bot games because I only play them for when I want to get the win of the day IP but only have like 20 minutes to play. If I made this damn post, my name would be highlighted with blue.
Yup, that's against all the rules. Hope you reported them!
we reported him, Whether that will lead to a ban or not is subject to debate.

*They're

Their book
They're reading a book

Their apples
They're eating apples
No I think you will find the team is his therefor falls under the "their" category perhaps you should re-evaluate your grasp on the English Language :)
